text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Actual CDC Quote: "There's a possibility that the assault of the virus on our nation next winter will actually be even more difficult than the one we just went through...We're going to have the flu epidemic and the coronavirus epidemic at the same time." 

You lying bitch.
